name: Brinq: Who gave that dog a skateboard!?
name_original: Brinq: Who gave that dog a skateboard!?
description:
A simple, chill endless runner about a dog skateboard-grinding along a powerline. Made for KiwiJam 2020.

While a controller is recommended, here are keyboard controls:
Left and Right keys or A and D - tilt left and right
Spacebar - jump
Escape - restart

If the web experience is too janky, please feel free to download the executable!
